TopicTitle: Facility Level Incorrect and not Upgradable

Articles.Content:
Don't know if this is a known issue or what. I could not find other help on the subject.

Problem:

When in the Space Center view, all of my buildings appear to be fully upgraded. However, upon entering a building, it has the limitations of a Level 1 building. Since it appears as a Level 3 building in the Space Center view, there is no way to upgrade the building. Where I presume the Upgrade button would be there is a button that says Fully Upgraded.

Conditions:

Fresh install (using a previous settings.cfg file, but everything else fresh) of the manually-downloaded and extracted ksp-win64-0-90-0.zip file.

I ran the updater/patcher (2.0.200) from the launcher screen.

Game says it's version 0.90.0.705 beta (x64) upon launching.

Start a new career.

Space Center shows all buildings Level 3.

Enter any building, and it has Level 1 limitations.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-18T15:59:44Z" title="02/18/2015 03:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 18, 2015</time> by WunderBeard**
  
Solved
That is a known bug with the Windows 64-bit version of KSP. Try using the 32-bit version instead.

Yes, this does work correctly in the 32-bit version.

A shame that this is such a seemingly simple issue, and it is not yet fixed. Keep up the good work, though!
